typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> C4OrdersSource
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> C4OrderDetails
C4OrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrdDtlCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrdDtlUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
C4OrdersSource, Select1 join(C4OrdersSource@OrderID == Select1@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinOrders
JoinOrders select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = C4OrdersSource@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID2 = Select1@OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrdDtlCreatedDate,
		OrdDtlUpdatedDate
	)) ~> EliminateColumn
EliminateColumn keyGenerate(output(GlobalOrderId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddColumnSK
AddColumnSK derive(SourceSystemID = concat('south', 'ridge')) ~> SourceSystemID
SourceSystemID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutputFile
